tag_list: udi, hoozin, group, chat, iphone, app
overview:
Co-Founder at Hoozin, marketing and Biz Dev. Three years of project management experience in both the semiconductor industry and in an Elite unit during his military service. Graduated from Tel Aviv University, majoring in Electrical Engineering.

Hoozin lets you interact on multiple levels: Talk as a group or in a two-way dialog, toss a comment to a couple of friends or share a secret with one special person.

Hoozin has solved the mobile group-chat challenge with a unified mobile space. Now multiple users can have shared or private conversations - all at the same time, all in the same place.
